module.name: ap210_assembly_physical_interface_requirements
module.keywords: module, assembly interface detailed design, critical component placement, keepout, keepin, mating connector, fit

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of physical interface requirements. Assembly Physical Interface Requirements includes the following information: critical component placement data, critical component placement or keepout or keepin requirements, connector placement data, mating connector placement data, geometric interface (fit) requirements to next level assembly. Supporting data including external definition, properties, product identification, documentation and authorization are included.

inscope.li: interface definition of the next higher assembly;
items within the scope of AP210_product_data_management_arm;
items within the scope of Characteristic_arm;
items within the scope of Requirement_decomposition_arm.

outscope.li: complete design definition of the assembly
complete design definition of the assembly in which this assembly is used
